itemDisplayName: Deploy Shibboleth Identity Provider cluster on Ubuntu.
description: This template deploys Shibboleth Identity Provider as a LAMP application on Ubuntu. It creates one or more Ubuntu VM, does a silent install of MySQL, Apache and JDK on each VM, and then deploys Shibboleth Identity Provider on each VM. It configures a load balancer for directing requests to VM's. It also configures NAT rules to allow admin access to each of the VM's. After the deployment is successful, you can go to /idp/profile/Status on each VM to check success.
summary: Deploy Shibboleth Identity Provider cluster on Ubuntu.
